title: Is rumbles flame under turret a bug/exploit or is this champion really that broken?
body: flames right under turret, doing damage, takes 0 turret focus. For an ability that also takes no mana and can basically be spammed almost non-stop I want to know if he's suppose to be able to do this or do I need to report this player from ranked.

replies.body:
Definitely a bug, if it is hitting you, no other champion is being targeted, and he is not being targeted.

Keep in mind there is a brief delay between turret targeting and firing, if he was running out of range.
ok thank you, and no he was completely solo and not out of range, literally underneath my turret, I know he couldn't be designed to do that. He did it non-stop so wasn't a one time thing.
